backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor managing per‑user categories, items, bills, settings, profiles, and PDF blobs with access‑controlled sync and storage operations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing a UI consistency requirement and listing related frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of numerous frontend files detailing their purpose across routing, layout, pages, models, and storage.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration defining light/dark theme variables and base styling rules.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML bootstrap file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
Computes sales analytics totals, monthly stats, and product/category breakdowns from bills and items.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React app configuring routing, theming, Internet Identity, auto‑sync, and global providers.
frontend/src/billing/amountInWords.ts: Converts numeric currency amounts into Indian‑style words including rupees and paise.
frontend/src/billing/billNumber.ts: Generates sequential yearly invoice numbers by scanning existing stored bills.
frontend/src/billing/calc.ts: Utility functions computing item totals with discount/GST and full bill totals.
frontend/src/components/charts/SimpleBar: Reusable bar chart component using Recharts to display monthly sales data.
frontend/src/components/charts/SimpleCat: Pie chart component rendering category‑wise sales distribution with dynamic colors.
frontend/src/components/charts/SimplePro: Renders a vertical bar chart of product amounts using Recharts and shows a fallback when no data is provided.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Defines the main app layout with navigation, dynamic document titles, routed content, and a footer.
frontend/src/components/layout/Responsiv: Provides mobile drawer and desktop tab navigation, highlighting active routes and enabling route changes.
frontend/src/components/sync/SyncCard.ts: Displays cloud sync controls, authentication state, auto-sync options, and manual sync actions.
frontend/src/components/sync/SyncStatusB: Shows a status badge reflecting sync states like idle, syncing, success, or error.
frontend/src/export/xlsxExport.ts: Generates CSV exports of bills and bill items and triggers a file download based on report type.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to identity changes, invalidating dependent queries as needed.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication and state.
frontend/src/hooks/useLocalBills.ts: Fetches local bills and items using React Query and provides an invalidate helper for related data.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind plus custom CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/models/settings.ts: Defines the settings model and default app settings including sync and company info.
frontend/src/models/types.ts: Declares TypeScript interfaces for categories, items, bills, and bill items.
frontend/src/pages/BillPreviewPage.tsx: Loads draft or saved bill data, renders a preview, and supports saving or downloading the bill as a PDF.
frontend/src/pages/CreateBillPage.tsx: Creates a new bill with dynamic item rows, auto-fills catalogue data, recalculates totals, and navigates to preview.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Displays sales analytics with summary cards and charts based on locally stored bills and items.
frontend/src/pages/ExportBackupPage.tsx: Exports bills and items to Excel with weekly, monthly, full, or manual backup options.
frontend/src/pages/ItemsCategoriesPage.t: Manages item categories and master items with create, edit, and delete actions using React Query.
frontend/src/pages/SavedBillsPage.tsx: Lists saved bills with search, viewing, PDF opening/downloading, and PDF regeneration features.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: React settings page allowing editing of company info, GST, backup frequency, and uploading logo/QR, with persistence via useSettings.
frontend/src/pages/StartPage.tsx: Landing page showing app branding and features with a button to navigate to the dashboard.
frontend/src/pdf/generateBillPdf.ts: Generates an HTML-based bill PDF blob using company settings, bill details, and inline styling.
frontend/src/settings/useSettings.ts: React hook that loads, caches, and updates settings using react-query and local storage repository.
frontend/src/storage/localDb.ts: Initializes and upgrades IndexedDB schema for categories, items, bills, settings, and bill PDFs with migration logic.
frontend/src/storage/repositories.ts: CRUD operations for categories, items, bills, and settings using IndexedDB transactions with soft-delete handling.
frontend/src/sync/merge.ts: Implements last-write-wins merge logic for categories, items, bills, bill items, and settings during sync.
frontend/src/sync/pdfSync.ts: Converts between browser Blob and ExternalBlob formats, optionally tracking upload progress.
frontend/src/sync/reactQueryInvalidation: Invalidates all local React Query caches related to app data collections.
frontend/src/sync/syncService.ts: Coordinates full sync flow including uploading local changes, downloading remote data, merging, and syncing PDFs.
frontend/src/sync/useAutoSync.ts: Automatically triggers sync on load when enabled, authenticated, idle, and not yet auto-synced.
frontend/src/sync/useSync.ts: Provides sync state management, triggering performSync and updating UI state and settings.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session-based parameters.
frontend/src/vite-env.d.ts: Declares Vite environment variable types including optional II URL.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, typography, container settings, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing app name requirements, versioning, features, and state.
